Municipal Development District Board of Directors
=================================================

* Tuesday evenings
* Oak Point City Hall
  100 Naylor Road
  Oak Point, TX 75068

The Municipal Development District Board of Directors members are appointed by the City Council and serve two-year staggered terms. Terms expire in July of each year. Currently,
Economic Development Corporation
members serve dual roles as Municipal Development District members.

* Betsy Sellinger, Member
  Term expires: July 2027
* James Hankins, Member
  Term expires: July 2027
* Greg Weiler, Member
  Term expires: July 2026

* Chris Risher, Vice President
  Term expires: July 2027
* David Wootton, President
  Term expires: July 2026
* Debbie Peterman, Member
  Term expires: July 2026

About the District
------------------

On May 14, 2011, voters in Oak Point and the Oak Point extraterritorial jurisdiction (
) voted to create the Oak Point Municipal Development District (
) and impose a 0.25% sales and use tax within the Oak Point City limits and
for the purpose of financing development projects beneficial to the
. Authorized projects include land, buildings, equipment, facilities, and improvements associated with:

The Board of the Oak Point
consists of seven members that recommend funding of authorized projects to the City Council.
